title: UmerIdrees
author: UmerIdrees
created_time: August 11, 2022, 02:59:00 AMLast edit: August 11, 2022, 03:17:16 AM by UmerIdrees
content: Official Site: https://kpl20.com/Official Song: https://youtu.be/Dy66r4E5kIkBRAND AMBASSADOR: Shahid Afridi

comments.author: WatChe
comments.body: So this is second edition of KPL. I am supporting Muzaffarabad tigers because of Hafeez aka professor. The Muzaffarabad stadium where KPL is being played has breathtaking views, will defiantly try to there and see the match in person.

comments.author: ZAINmalik75
comments.body: Awesome yeh ik achi news haa hamare cricket community ka liyaa q ky inn he leagues ki wajah sy new player ko moka milta haa jis sy new talented player obber kar aaty haa aur Baad ma Pakistan cricket ki jaan Bann jaty haa iske missal Shaheen Afridi ki shakal ma hamary Samny haa .Ma samajta hu ka leagues sy new young talent aata haa Jo future ma Pakistan team ko lead kary ga Yani PSL as well as KPL jo ky Pakistan ki team ko behtaree Bana dy ge .#KPL#kheloAazadiSe

comments.author: Hamza2424
comments.body: Woo, That good now PSL and KPL two exciting season's are going to be Held in Pakistan. I think its yearly based seasonal Series. Lets see it isvery good Opertunity for all our Local Players as i can see if there will be distributed series then more Locals can participate and we can see new National Player hope so some talent bring off from such series.

comments.author: SATWAT
comments.body: @UmerIdress good work by you mate we need some good activity here for Pakistan as well because we have no solid platform and no one trying to do things like this hopefully as this event will start I will contribute something positive because I am also big fan of cricket and specially T-20 is surely amazing lets wait for start, and we will have some good discussion about this.

comments.author: WatChe
comments.body: Quote from: Hamza2424 on August 11, 2022, 02:45:50 PMWoo, That good now PSL and KPL two exciting season's are going to be Held in Pakistan. I think its yearly based seasonal Series. Lets see it isvery good Opertunity for all our Local Players as i can see if there will be distributed series then more Locals can participate and we can see new National Player hope so some talent bring off from such series.Pakistan has so much talent of cricket that even without international players they can have a successful KPL. KPL is best example that even without international players you can have a successful t20 league. Last year Gibbs was there in KPL not sure whether he is joining in this year or not. One more thing KPL must have few players from Azad Jammu and Kashmir also.

comments.author: WatChe
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoYar on August 11, 2022, 11:00:18 PM Rawalakot Hawks playersPCB haven't given chance to star of KPL 2021 final aka Kahif Ali and Aif Afridi. They both were the reason why hawks won the KPL 2021 but year ha been passed and they both were not given any chance in Pakistan T20I squad. I am again supporting 'Muzaffarabad tigers' the last year runner up.

comments.author: noormcs5
comments.created_time: August 13, 2022, 04:26:30 AMLast edit: August 13, 2022, 05:11:10 AM by noormcs5
comments.body: Can anyone tell who is covering this league? I mean on which international sports channel we can watch this?Secondly, as i know Pakistan has their series with Ireland in few days times. Does this directly conflict with this league and the few famous Pakistan players may not be available for this Kashmir Premier League?

comments.author: SATWAT
comments.body: Quote from: noormcs5 on August 13, 2022, 04:26:30 AMCan anyone tell who is covering this league? I mean on which international sports channel we can watch this?Secondly, as i know Pakistan has their series with Ireland in few days times. Does this directly conflict with this league and the few famous Pakistan players may not be available for this Kashmir Premier League?You can find here all information about this https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6agO1JJK5CcFor second question yes you are right It's directly conflicting with this tour and many players are going to miss which is replaced by local players and mostly foreign players are not coming here due to BCCI threat they will not allow players those will play here in this league.

comments.author: WatChe
comments.body: Quote from: noormcs5 on August 13, 2022, 04:26:30 AMCan anyone tell who is covering this league? I mean on which international sports channel we can watch this?Secondly, as i know Pakistan has their series with Ireland in few days times. Does this directly conflict with this league and the few famous Pakistan players may not be available for this Kashmir Premier League?Kashmir Premier League KPL 2022 Live Broadcasting TV Channels ListBSports PakistanPTV Sports LiveTen Sports LiveA Sports HD LiveGeo SuperWillow TVGoonj APPPakistan has series with Netherlands and not with Ireland. There are still many T20I players available on Pakistan for KPL.

comments.author: noormcs5
comments.body: Quote from: WatChe on August 13, 2022, 02:46:53 PMQuote from: noormcs5 on August 13, 2022, 04:26:30 AMCan anyone tell who is covering this league? There are still many T20I players available on Pakistan for KPL.Does this mean that it is only broadcasted in Pakistan? They need to include the international players if they need international recognition for this tournament.Yes, my bad, Pakistan has the series with the Netherlands. Will the main players will be going to the Netherlands as the Netherlands is a weak team and the Pakistan B team can also show some good performances if the main players are busy in kpl?

comments.author: Hamza2424
comments.body: Quote from: noormcs5 on August 13, 2022, 04:26:30 AMCan anyone tell who is covering this league? I mean on which international sports channel we can watch this?Secondly, as i know Pakistan has their series with Ireland in few days times. Does this directly conflict with this league and the few famous Pakistan players may not be available for this Kashmir Premier League?Thats a sad part that famous players cant join but that good as well, as now we know that if famous players are not participating then local talent has a chance to stand above them. May be we can have a freah talented national player. I think there should be more series like KPL. That can Stand us on the Better International level.

That can Stand us on the Better International level.Yeah, due to no international players playing in KPL, the interest for the bitcointalk users is not much in this series. Also, KPL is not being broadcast internationally making viewership a lot less.Each team has played two matches each and below is the point table for anyone who is interested

comments.author: Hamza2424
comments.body: Nicely Done, I didn't followed the matches yet but after watching the points table i will definitely follow all the matches lat couple of days i was busy and i just followed some matches in ODI and a few in T20. Lets now count this series as well in watch list. Intrsting to see the performance of the Leading team how they defend their Position on the Table.

comments.author: UmerIdrees
comments.body: Quote from: Hamza2424 on August 19, 2022, 05:14:16 PMNicely Done, I didn't followed the matches yet but after watching the points table i will definitely follow all the matches lat couple of days i was busy and i just followed some matches in ODI and a few in T20. Lets now count this series as well in watch list. Intrsting to see the performance of the Leading team how they defend their Position on the Table.  Yes, since there are a lot of new players in the teams we are unaware of, it might not be that interesting to watch the matches in KPL. Also, since Pakistan A team is playing with the Netherlands, we are missing those key players in this tournament like Baber Azam. Unfortunately, I am also not following this tournament with the usual dedication.

comments.author: virasog
comments.body: Quote from: UmerIdrees on August 20, 2022, 02:14:09 PMQuote from: Hamza2424 on August 19, 2022, 05:14:16 PMNicely Done, I didn't followed the matches yet but after watching the points table i will definitely follow all the matches lat couple of days i was busy and i just followed some matches in ODI and a few in T20. Also, since Pakistan A team is playing with the Netherlands, we are missing those key players in this tournament like Baber Azam. Unfortunately, I am also not following this tournament with the usual dedication. I just heard that KPL season has just concluded and Mirpur Royals won the tournament. Also, I heard that Mirpur Royals were awarded the final as all the Eliminators including the final were abandoned due to rain. Never heard of any tournament in which all the eliminators are abandoned. Also, I just learned all this through cricinfo.

Also, I just learned all this through cricinfo. I dont know but for a quite time i used to follow the season but after that a day ago suddenly i got excited to know who won but on the tracking table there was shown Match abandoned and I didn't understood what happened so from that time no updates but if Mirpur Royals really won then thats good for them.

comments.body: Quote from: virasog on August 26, 2022, 03:25:27 PMQuote from: UmerIdrees on August 20, 2022, 02:14:09 PMQuote from: Hamza2424 on August 19, 2022, 05:14:16 PMNicely Done, I didn't followed the matches yet but after watching the points table i will definitely follow all the matches lat couple of days i was busy and i just followed some matches in ODI and a few in T20. Also, since Pakistan A team is playing with the Netherlands, we are missing those key players in this tournament like Baber Azam. Unfortunately, I am also not following this tournament with the usual dedication. I just heard that KPL season has just concluded and Mirpur Royals won the tournament. Also, I heard that Mirpur Royals were awarded the final as all the Eliminators including the final were abandoned due to rain. Never heard of any tournament in which all the eliminators are abandoned. Also, I just learned all this through cricinfo.Yes, that's a sad ending for the tournament as we did not have the opportunity to see the matches as matches including the final abandoned due to rain. There is a lot of flood and rain currently in Pakistan and many people are in deep trouble due to this crisis. There is nothing much we can do about these natural disasters.Anyways, it's Sohaib Malik's team Mirpur who won the KPL season 2.
